1331111111112.content:
An hour had come and gone, with both Hinata and Sakura stuck in their infantile state. Both girls had been subjecting Naruto to messes (both one and two), crying, tantrums, scenarios of danger, and giggles. If it weren't for the fact that he was guarding some of his favorite people, he would not have taken this. Plus, it was still technically still his fault for doing this, so he had to take some responsibility.

But once the hour had come and gone, the girls blinked several times before they regained their senses.

"Wha...what's going on?" Sakura asked.

"You mean you don't remember?" Hinata replied back.

"Hinata?!" Sakura cried, suddenly seeing the Hyuga and her current state before looking at herself and growling, "Oh, not this again!"

"I know", Hinata muttered, going over to hug her friend, "But at least Naruto has been watching us".

Sakura raised an eyebrow. Not that she didn't trust the blond idiot, but if something weird is going on and he wasn't the focus of why, they were in serious trouble. Still, Naruto wasn't that bad of a guy and the fact that, once again, they were being watched by the strongest ninja in the village helped put Sakura's mind at ease.

"Hinata?"

"Hmmm?" Hinata replied, removing her head from Sakura's shoulder.

"Um...could you stop hugging me like I'm one of your stuffed toys?"

"Oh. OH!" Hinata cried and withdrew herself from Sakura, "S...Sorry, Sakura-chan".

"Well, looks like you guys are up", Naruto said walking back with their clothes, "Here, you might need these".

"Why? What's going on?" Sakura asked nervously.

"If my thoughts were right, Tenten was looking for reasons why Tsunade had been acting as young as she was last time. She hasn't shown up yet".

o.o.o.o.o.o.o.

In truth, it had been Naruto whom had ran into Tenten the last time, but considering Hinata just happened to show up at his home this time around, he thought the same would be involved. Alas, Tenten hadn't shown up. And despite not knowing the bun headed girl too much, he was still rather worried.

With Sakura and Hinata behind (both still wearing their protective garments under their pants, all three spread out and searched for Tenten, given a firework to signal whenever someone found her. The search was long and arduous, with all three ninja running here and there.

Naruto was getting anxious when he heard the sound of a firework going off. He turned to look and saw the general area was a back alley. Jumping to the source, Naruto found Hinata hiding behind the fences where the alley way was. Sakura showed up nearly three seconds later.

"You found her?" Naruto asked.

Hinata nodded and pointed towards their lost friend.

The ninja's had gone through alleyways, through the market, up the desolated streets and even through several houses (Some bystanders thought it was an act to help relieve tension [or another of Naruto's pranks]). It wasn't until Tenten stopped near the BBQ place that Choji loved so much that the other Ninja's finally caught up.

With a bit of hassle, Tenten was being dragged back to Naruto's house. Naruto, Hinata and Sakura were all tired, sweaty and exhausted.

"I...don't think...I could take...another...step...", Sakura muttered.

"That goes double for me", Naruto wheezed.

Hinata, so out of breath, was unable to form a cohesive sentence.

Tenten merely raised her left leg and proceeded to "scratch" her head. In reality, it appeared as if she was merely hitting herself with the appendage.

"What now?" Sakura asked, "We can't just leave Tenten like this".

Sakura and Hinata both blushed, but nodded in agreement.

1331111111112211.title: The chase begins...

13311111111122112.content:
It was several hours since Naruto left. Sakura and Hinata, waiting for him to come back, sat and had some small talk here or there about recent events and Naruto in general. Tenten would lie down on the floor, almost looking like a rock than a dog from the way she was positioned.

Rather than attempting to take the poor girl inside like the dog she supposedly was acting like, Sakura and Hinata had agreed that probably putting her in a diaper would be safer than just to taking her outside. Less questions asked as well.

“What should we do with her?” Hinata asked, petting the former weapons master, “She’s so much different when this happened the last time”.

“I know”, Sakura said, “And we can’t ask her who did this to her, so there goes that option”.

Sakura stared out the cracked window. Naruto’s old home hadn’t been touched too badly since Pains attack, though a lot of debris was piled around it. In fact, unlike the majority of Konoha, Naruto’s home was one of the few buildings that remained standing. Days of cleanup had freed a majority of the clutter, but there was still much remaining.

Sakura was also wondering on where Naruto was going that would help him research Tenten’s condition. It wasn’t as if Naruto could go to the library. All of the books and scrolls were also destroyed during the battle. They would attempt to scavenge and repair, but there was so much lost knowledge and books that it would no longer be a factor.

“Sakura?”

Sakura looked up and noticed Hinata looking at her intensely. She scooted back a bit out of reflex and asked, “Yes?”

“Are you okay? These past few days have been really hard on you, haven’t they?”

Sakura thought on that, but nodded, “Yeah. There’s been a lot of things going on that I’d rather just forget. Especially…” Sakura blinked back some tears. Sasuke’s blatant turn-around was still ringing in her ears. She still loved him, but it was getting harder and harder without him here. And Naruto, still being the goofball she loved, was always doing his best for her, despite her shortcomings.

What a fool she had been. Naruto was always there for her when she had needed it. Sasuke…he had also been there, but the intentions weren’t the same. And then, there were the dreams.

“How have you been though, Hinata?” she asked the Hyuuga heiress, “I mean, jumping into the middle of a duel and then getting stabbed like that. I mean, I know I’m a decent healer, but are you holding up okay?”

“Yes, thank you”, Hinata smiled, “I mean, it was nearly close, like you said, but I’m glad you were there to help me when you did”.

Hinata had almost died that day, were it not for Naruto’s berserk actions to separate her from Pain and Sakura’s quick action to help her when she needed it. Whether they knew it or not, Hinata owed both of them her life, though for Naruto it was much more. And then there was that little issue prompting itself in the back of Hinata's mind too.

“Sakura, have you been having strange dreams lately?” Hinata asked.

“Strange?” Sakura asked, eyes narrowing, “What do you mean?”

“I mean…I go to sleep, and then I wake up. I’m in a giant nursery. I can’t walk, and I think I’m sucking on something. I find I can crawl, and then I see you”, Hinata blushed furiously at this point, nudging her fingers together, “You’re lying there in nothing but a diaper, babbling and just being content”.

“Was I...?” Sakura started, blushing herself, “Was I a baby?”

Sakura frowned, but her features softened. She knew he was right in how unfairly she was treating him, taking it out on him while being the ditz in love that she was. All the times she yelled at him, pounded the snot out of him and overall despising of the person in front of her...because it was the popular thing to do. Whether it had something to do with Sasuke and gaining his attention was for another debacle.

"So I saw the jutsu and thought of something to use as a prank. That was it and nothing more. If I had known you would be stuck like this years from now, I never would have performed it. And now I can't fix you. And I'm sorry."

He cried now, openly. His body racked with sobs while his fists clenched painfully in Hinata's hands. Hinata took no notice of this and moved over to the weeping boy, rubbing his back with a free hand while bringing him in closer for a hug.

"Thank you, Naruto...that's all I wanted to hear", Hinata said, while hugging her friend and now confirmed lover, "I can't say I won't forget this so easily...but I know it was not made with the darkest of intentions."

No kidding thought Tenten Imagine if someone else had found this jutsu. Who knows what they could have done with it. It's a comfort to know that it at least fell into the hands of this idiot.

"I forgive you too, Naruto", Tenten said, coming over to his other side and joining in the hug, "I'm still mad you did it, but I can at least trust you with your reason why. And that if it hadn't been for you, we wouldn't have been able to experience it."

Hinata gave her a quizzical look.

"What?" Tenten shrugged, "I've been converted into a diaper lover. I don't mind sharing, especially if its with my fellow babies."

Naruto chuckled wiping his tears from his eyes. They were bloodshot from crying so much. But his troubles were far from over. Everyone turned to Sakura.
1331111111112211222121.title: Trusting Naruto part 1

13311111111122112221211.content:
(A/N ran out of space. Here's part 2)

The girls face was downcast. She moved to stand and then sat back down in front of Naruto once more. There was a moment of silence. Then, with a whip like motion, Sakura slapped Naruto in the face.

There was no chakra within the blow, as Sakura meant for a light touch rather than her full strike. But before anyone else could react, Sakura then moved to hug the knucklehead as well.

"You didn't force us to do anything we didn't want to except for these twisted diapers. I can't say that I haven't grown fond of them myself, especially when you took care of us. You never took advantage of us during any of those times. But I hate you. I hate that you lied and manipulated us. I hate the fact that you used me as a means to play a practical joke. And I hate that my life has changed because of you."

Before Naruto could hang his head in shame again, Sakura caught his head by the chin and forced him to look him square in the eye.

"But I know it couldn't have been easier for you either. Everyone hating you, leaving you lonely and all because someone took the demon fox and stuck him in you. You've had more to suffer than us and for no good reason. That's what brings me to this quandry, Naruto".

The look she gave him was stern, as tears fell from her eyes as well.

"You do not take control of people like that. Even Ino could tell you the same thing if she were here right now. It's one of the first priniciples she learned when perfecting her jutsu; they don't abuse the powers they have been given. You did...but not to its fullest limit. You played a joke. And we suffer for it. But you didn't take the joke and turn it into something horrible. We...turned to you in our distress...and you didn't turn us away. You helped us. You found a place for us to hide when we become like this....and when we wanted pleasure....you gave it to us too."

She smiled, and kissed him on the cheek.

"I love you too, Naruto Uzumaki. It took me a while to get there, but I do. I don't want to trade that away for anything, but I can' t love someone who abuses the ones who love him as well. I want you, on your nindo, that you will never do something like that to anyone else again, especially to others who will come to feel the same way as we do."

Naruto blinked, "Um...we?"

Hinata giggled, "Who else would she be talking about silly?"

Naruto looked at Hinata, who kissed his cheek as well. then at Tenten, who hesitated a bit, "I'm still trying to see if my relationship with Neji will hold any water, but...yes...I do care for the one who diapered me as well. But I think I'm in the runner's up circle when it comes to truly loving you, Naruto."

Naruto stared all around, his heart growing and fresh new tears falling on his face again. "Thank you. All of you. I don't deserve this kindness...from any of you."

"And you propbably don't", Tenten said, causing Naruto to flinch, but she smiled, "Then again, you probably do since we all know yo to be one of the most selfless ninjas in this day and age. Boy...could you imagine if Kiba got a hold on this jutsu?"

Hinata activated her byakugan as quick as a flash, "Do not speak of such blaspheme!"

Everyone laughed, Naruto hardest of all, but he ended abruptly as a new question plagued his lips, "So, what do we do now?"

"We're not having sex if that's what you thinking about, Naruto", Sakura stated in a matter-of-fact tone, "After all this drama tonight I don't think any of us are willing to do that sort of thing with you...for a long while. Until you've proven yourself a better man, you are not touching this diapered harem for a while."

Everyone stared blankly at Sakura after she finished, her hands on her diapered hips.

"Diapered...?" Hinata started.

"Harem...?" Naruto finished.

"What? This is clearly all this was meant for and you know it", Sakura replied coyly.

"What?!" Naruto cried enraged, "Didn't I just explain that this is not what I had intended!"

"You sure did", Sakura said, playing along with Naruto's emotions, "But clearly having five girls in total at your beck and call sure seems like the start of something sleazy."

Naruto slumped, "Well, when you it that way, the truth hurts when you think about it..."

"Oh, Naruto I was only joking", Sakura replied in exasperation. Then quickly added, "About your intentions, not about the sex".

"Kinda figured", Naruto answered, "I wasn't born yesterday, Sakura. I can tell when someone's playing me."

"Coulda fooled me", Sakura said, smirking, "But the ruling still stands. You are not touching any of us unless it is to change our diapers. Think of it as an endurance test to prove yourself, Naruto."

"Oooh, this is going to be fun!" Tenten squealed in joy, "And we can use all those techniques that Anko had been teaching us in kunoichi training just to make it entertaining!"

Naruto gulped. The snake mistress of Konoha, Anko, was a seductress and deviant of the entire hidden leaf. A fan of dango and showing off her body, she was of the highest order against perverts. Naruto distrusted her for a number of reasons, though he did like the kunoichi for who she was. He was also secretly glad he had never decided to induct her though a small part of him wondered what if he had.

*I*I*I*I*


Meanwhile in a forest area near the Mountain's graveyard, a grown woman of twenty eight was resting in the forest while she and her team where hunkering down for the night. They had been searching for the remains of Orochimaru's flunkies, particularly Kabuto, but their search ended as night fell. Now they rest til the next day when a feeling ran down the kunoichi's spine.

"I sense the feelings that I am missing out on one of the greatest orgies the world has ever known", she said aloud to herself, "and I can't help but feel depressed or angry about that."

Her comrades each gave the other looks of confusion. One of the fresher ones called out,"Well, Anko-san, if you really want to-" he stopped abruptly as several small needles were thrusted below his chin, nearly grazing the skin. The sweet scent of toxins filled his nostrils.

"INTERRUPT MY THOUGHTS AGAIN, BOB! SEE WHAT HAPPENS!!!" Anko replied with a manic grin on her face.

Bob remained silent for all his life was worth. Anko turned away from him and the others shook their heads.

Greenhorn.

*I*I*I*I*


"Okay, so I don't get to be with you guys until you say so? I can handle that. More than I could hope for, really", Naruto chuckled, "But what about now?"

"We go on living, I suppose", Sakura said, rocking back and forth on her diaper, "But there was something I wanted to try out with you and HInata". She winked at the Hyuuga and both of them smiled.

"Oh?" Naruto asked, looking at both of them, "And what would..."There was a burst of chakra and smoke as both Hinata and Sakura cast a quick henshin. As the smoke cleared Naruto looked to see a smaller version of either girl beside him, both swimming in clothing far too small for them. If he to take a guess, Naruto thought they looked half their age at that point.

"You get to take care of us for a while like you did before!" Sakura replied, her voice higher than normal, "but now we have our big girl minds in these little girl bodies. And right now, we're hungry!"

Hinata smiled and nodded, looking at Naruto expectantly. Naruto could do nothing more than blink in shock at the turn of events before another explosion happened, revealing a smaller Tenten as well.

"Yeah, daddy!" Tenten replied, holding on to Naruto's right arm in a hug, "We're hungry! I haven't eaten anything all day!"

Naruto looked round at the suddenly regressed girls and sighed in exasperation. But he smiled all the same. It was going to be an interesting few weeks, that was for sure.
13311111111122112221211.title: Trusting Naruto part 2

133111111111221122212111.content:
In the darkness of the forest a lone figure runs through the branches. The light on her slim figure would suggest a woman, though the glittering of her wings suggested otherwise. She darted here and there, almost as if she never touched the Earth as she propelled herself forward, always wary in case she would come under attack.

She had no idea as to where she was. All she knew was that she must flee lest they come and find her again. She remembered only flashes of what had happened to her before; but only flashes came to mind. Her capture, her imprisonment and the eventuality of her death. But she hadn't really died. Not yet, anyway. Chōmei had helped her find a way to survive her captors by wrapping her in a camouflaged cocoon while sacrificing one of his many wings as a transformed version of her, seemingly weakened and defeated. Yet even her capture had seemed dubious.

She was with her body guards when they were confronted by three strangers, one of them seemingly familiar based on the legends of her people. The others were a Caucasian male wieding a scythe and the third was a man holding a pocket watch in his hand. This last one intrigued her as she watched the watch moving back and forth....back and forth...

Then, she remembered nothing till she woke in her cell with some unfortunate additions.

They had needed her to be weak, to be unable to defend herself while they held her. That is what she heard while they brought more of her kind into their own cells...before ripping out their souls.

She stayed in hibernation in the cocoon, awaiting the moment when the defenses would be at their weakest. The moment Chōmei sensed a lack of obstacles, the girl broke out of the cocoon and fled, hearing others chasing after her but unable to catch her.

The last she remembered she was in the land of Swamp. But that had been several days ago. Now she couldn't tell where she was at all, flitting from tree to tree as she tried in vain to hear her pursuers. Yet she did not watch were she was going and collided with what appeared to be a moving caravan.

When she awoke, she was staring into the face of a young girl with white hair, staring at her with pale eyes. She seemed so familiar but she couldn't truly tell. She thought her hair was black back then. But she wasted no time in making her needs known, especially when she felt a creeping feeling upon her psyche.

"Please...Please...you've...you....I need...help..." she whispered in a panic, almost hyperventilating as her voice cracked and turned into sobs, "Please....help me....hewp me ma ma!"

She broke down in tears as she wept into the girls lap, all the while a familiar noise she had grown accustomed to roared in the silence of her company as she flooded her full diaper with pee.

"Lady Shion!" One of the attendents cried, but the white haired woman held her hand, "Don't. I know this girl. She is to accompany us. Come, we must hurry or we will be overtaken."
133111111111221122212111.title: Escape and Rescue

1331111111112211222121111.content:
It had been several weeks between Naruto's revelation to the girls situation. True to their word, none of them had let Naruto participate in any activity until he could remember how he had performed the jutsu in the first place and freed them from their torment. Even now he was looking in several hidden locations, particularly in Orochimaru's old and abandoned hide outs, for any information on the jutsu, but with no luck at all.

In the meantime, Naruto's life was spent taking care of the village in small doses with shadow clones and helping with the girls when they had another episode. Tsunade and Shizune were left to their own devices as they could take care of each other, but it was the combination of Hinata, Sakura and Tenten whom needed him most. Yet only when they were in his home that their symptoms kicked in.

It's like they're doing this on purpose Naruto growled as he hopped from one roof top to another.

The girls had been treating him fairly but each had their own time to play a joke on him, whether intentional or not. It was really hard to take Hinata out on a date when all of a sudden she would be sucking her thumb and babbling incoherently next to him as they were walking in the park. Missions with Sakura were just as strange when she would hang back for a second to let Naruto know in secret that she needed a change. Tenten was the easiest of the three but only because she wasn't around him as often as the other two. Thankfully she never returned to the dog personality they had found her in (at least, not yet) but she soon slipped into her immature form once the other two were assembled. But even if they were in their right minds, the moment Naruto came home he would be surrounded by henshined little girls welcoming him back and wanting to play with him.

He chuckled to himself. He didn't hate it, since they were still friends and the games they played were at least fun. But it made him sad just a little to think about when he was that young and he had never had this kind of attention before. It felt...nice.

Wonder what they are up to now? Naruto asked as he continued his patrol
1331111111112211222121111.title: Back with Naruto

13311111111122112221211112.content:
The girls had no choice. They would need to bring Ino back into the fold.

They knew from what Naruto had told them that Ino was just as much a part of this as anything. Temari was a curiosity since Naruto had mentioned her as well but Temari was content with hanging around with Shikamaru so there was little chance that she had been infected like the others.

ino was walking down a mainstreet, her mind riddled with conflicting thoughts. She had recently fallen in love with Sai, Naruto's new team mate, and her crush only seemed to draw her closer to him. But her thoughts would always shift over to Sakura for some bizarre reason. That was crazy! After all, Sakura was her friend and she had no reason to think about her in that way? Didn't she?

After all, the girls had all gotten together at one point and had taken baths in the onsen several times. Sure, they would be sitting around naked (though admittedly all the other girls took longer to dress and undress whenever they went) but they had never explored their bodies in that kind of behavior. She may have fondled Hinata's chest in a fit of jealousy but what girl hasn't done that?

Then her mind flickered back to when she was alone, lying in bed and she was allowed to drift into fantasy. She would think about Sakura, either standing over her or lying beneath her. Both would be embarrassed for some reason, but then Sakura would grab a pacifier from out of nowhere and stick it into her mouth. Then she would give Ino a very cute look while just sucking on it. It drove Ino mad as she sat up, removing herself from her fantasy. Why would she think about things of that nature? And why was Sakura always sucking on a pacifier?

She was still walking down the streets, building still under construction as she went, when she felt a tap on her shoulder. She turned around to find Sakura standing behind her.

"Hi, Ino." Sakura waved.

Ino was a bti shocked at first, seeing one of the people so deep in her thoughts just standing behind her, but composed herself and replied, "Hey, forehead. What's up?"

Sakura, drawing back a sigh from her friend's famous nickname for her, replied, "Just wanted to know if you wanted a girl's night out thing today? Naruto's out for a while and he said we could use his house while he's gone."

Ino raised an eyebrow, "You sure go over to his house a lot, don't you? What's going on?"

Sakura blushed but continued, "Well, the girls and I found this really cool calming technique. Something that will help rejuvenate the mind and ease stress. Are you in?"

Ino though on this for a while. Things had been rough for the past few days and while life was slowly coming back together, it had been stressful for a lot of ninja.

"Sure", Ino replied, "What's the harm in a little down time?"

*I*I*I*I*

Sakura was smirking wickedly to herself. The plan was foolproof, bringing Ino in for a little fun time with her and the girls. A bit of innocent play, as it were. Or perhaps, not so innocent.

She had cursed herself for probating Naruto from touching them for so long. It should have ended sooner but she was insistent to herself that Naruto had to be taught a lesson. True to his word, Naruto did nothing lewd or crude to them ever since. But when he was changing them, his hands moved with such a delicacy and smooth touch that it left the girls wanting more but getting nothing as he left before they could jump him. It was almost as if they had placed the probation on themselves as well.

Hinata had suggested that they have their own fun, since she was frustrated her relationship with Naruto couldn't move forward due to the probation and their constant regressions they kept having. Tenten was in agreement since, while Neji was fun to be with, he was still as stoic as ever. They even suggested Ino show up for old times sake. After all, they had started this as sisters and it would be hard without the fourth. Sakura sighed and agreed to go get her on the condition that they played along with her little game.

Now they stood at Naruto's door waiting for entry after Sakura knocked on the door. Hinata answered and let the two in, closing and locking the door behind them. The girls sat down on a couch and had some minor chit chat about current events, what Naruto was doing and when the village would be back to its old self once more.

Ino stretched, "I honestly can't wait for that barbecue place Choji loves to open back up again. It hasn't been the same since my team has gone over there just to celebrate and it is driving Choji mad. He's had to make due, of course, but I can't tell you ow many times I've seen him drooling at random times."

"Sounds pretty rough," Tenten nodded, "At least you haven't been having to deal with the wonder twins all day. I swear, Guy sensei and Lee always seem to find some new means of tortu-I mean, training and it just gets more and more bizarre every time."

"Sounds like we can all use a breather, I guess", Sakura said, winking at the other three, "But, Ino, I think there is something we need to talk to you about first."

"Oh? What is that?" Ino asked.

And the girls explained their situation, what Naruto had done a long time ago and how he was now trying to fix it. Ino was even more shocked when, as proof of concept, Sakura pulled down her shorts a smidge to reveal the crimson diaper she now wore underneath.Looking around, Ino now couldn't help but notice the buldges that Hinata and Tenten now sported as well. It wasn't as noticeable at first, but now that they had pointed it out, it was too obvious.

"So...Naruto did this as a prank? I can see why he would, it is in his nature", Ino replied in a calm tone while inside she was raging about Naruto's lack of sense. She would be having her own words with him later, "Has he done anything else with this jutsu? Anyone we know?"

"Ummm..."Tenten started while the other two blushed but stared pointedly at Ino.

"Oh...my...God..." Ino blushed so hard, her face was the same hue as Sakura's undergarments, "He didn't."

"He did", Sakura replied.

"Please tell me he didn't take advantage of me while I was lost in some trance", Ino anxiously replied.

"No, as far as I know Naruto never touched you", Hinata replied.

Ino sighed, "Oh, that's a relief. Can't imagine how I would have explained to my father about that. So, what now? Do you still become little kids now?"

"Only when we're alone like this and when Naruto is around. He told us that he didn't restart the hypnosis, which is why he's trying to get more information." Tenten explained,"Otherwise, we'd have been like this when he got back initially with Jiraya."

"No kidding", Sakura said, "Would have had plenty of time to do so too."

"So why tell me this?" Ino asked, "This isn't some trick to get me back into the fold is it?"

The girls all looked at each other nervously.

"You've got to be kidding me".

"It's not like it is a permanent thing",Sakura replied, placing her hand on Ino's and causing her heart to skip a beat, "We just wanted to try something out with each other and since you were with us initially we wanted to see if you wanted in."

Ino's eyes narrowed, "And there's no chance of Naruto showing up unexpectedly and taking advantage of us while we're like this?"

Hinata frowned, "That's not fair. Naruto never really hurt us, nor did he take advantage of us when we were helpless."

Tenten nodded with a smirk, "Yeah, usually it was the other way around. Naruto never had much experience when it came to handling women so we usually took advantage of him."

Ino's eyes widened in shock, "What?"

"Ino, we don't have much time until Naruto actually does come home. If we want to do this, it has to be now," Sakura said, "We don't want to force you if you don't want to, but...will you join us?"

Ino looked into Sakura's face. For a second, she swear she saw the pacifier in her mouth sucking in contention. She sighed, "Fine. But just this one time, okay? I don't want to be developing any bad habits because of this."

Sakura smiled and nodded over to Hinata who stood up and left. Sakura, in the meanwhile, hesitantly said, "There's...just one thing we have to do before this starts. You may not like it."

"And what would..." Ino started and then noticed something in Sakura's hands. Ino then began to shake her head profusely, "Uh-uh! No way!"
13311111111122112221211112.title: Time with Ino (prt 1)

133111111111221122212111121.content:
"I can't believe this", Ino muttered, poking to the lilac undergarment she was now sporting. Sakura and Tenten had put up a terrific fight against her but both ladies had succeeded in dressing her in one of the many colored diapers that they had. She was still dressed with her purple top and skirt, but the diaper bulged from underneath. No matter how many times she tried, Ino couldn't get it covered up.

"C'mon, Ino, cheer up", Tenten replied, crawling next to the blonde, "At least you're not acting like a dog".

"What?" Ino asked.

"Long story", Tenten grumbled, "Though Naruto had nothing to do with that one apparently".

Ino was still staring at Tenten when Hinata came back, "Found it! Still can't believe that this house held this kind of scroll."

"What scroll?" Ino asked.

Sakura took the scroll away from Hinata and proceeded to open it, "It's a special illusion jutsu. It allows the users into an hour long illusion of their own fantasies. A means to just escape".

Ino hesitated, "And just what do you plan doing with this?"

"You'll see", Sakura winked and flashed her hand in several motions. With the final hand sign she called out, "Release!"

Their was a feeling of an invisible wave pouring out from their vicinity.All four girls shuddered as they felt a force flow through their entire bodies. They stared around, wondering what had happened.

"Did it work?" Hinata asked.

"I think it did", Tenten replied, "You're hair is looking a bit shorter than before".

"What are you talking about?" Ino asked, feeling like her clothes didn't fit her right.

"Oh, right. We're stuck in an illusion for the next hour or so and we're slowly getting younger until we're babies", Sakura replied.

"What?!" Ino cried, "Why would you want that?"

"Well, we've been constantly regressing mentally for a while now", Hinata replied, "We wanted to see how it would be physically different."

"It's not like it is permanent and we'll still be big girls", Tenten said, "But we'll be having a different perspective as well".

"It also gives us a chance", Sakura stated as she moved closed to Tenten, "To relax a little bit". And she placed a hand on Tenten's cheek and moved her face so they could kiss.

Ino's eyes widened as she watched her friends kissing each other. It was strange and yet she felt an influx of emotions through her. She was horrified that this was a means for them to screw each other. For that matter, this was the weirdest way to do it too; stuck in an illusion that made them physically regress while wearing diapers until they were nothing but babies. And what would happen to her? She hadn't recalled any hypnotism on her but would she really be back to messing herself when the day was done?

Then there was a part of her that was excited. Some small part of her wanted some release since she and Sai hadn't really gone into the realm of adult relations but they were still young and he was off doing his own missions as well.It left her frustrated at times and this seemed like a good moment to vent some frustration.

But she was also jealous for some reason. She thought that she would kiss Sakura. It was in her mind that they should be together. Shouldn't they?

Before she could make any moves though, she felt a touch on her shoulder. She looked to see a nervous Hinata sitting right next to her.

"You're...you're okay with this, right?" Hinata asked, "After all, it is a bit much to take in and we don't want to take advantage of you."

Ino stared into Hinata's regressing face. It almost looked as if a whole year had passed and her hoodie was starting to grow on her, hiding her bulge in her pants. Her hair was even more shorter now than before, but it hadn't changed a whole lot.

Was she really okay? Did she really want this or was this something Naruto had planned? She searched her heart, hoping to find an answer. What she found was Sakura, once again with a pacifier in her mouth, sucking contentedly.

"I...guess I'll give it a shot", Ino said reluctantly as she moved closer to Hinata. Hinata smiled and then, slowly, moved in to kiss Ino as well.

"Wow, this regressions going pretty quick", Tenten suddenly stated. Both she and Sakura were standing up at this point and as Ino and Hinata broke apart, both could see that both girls respective pants had fallen to the ground, revealing a crimson and pink diaper respectively.

"Funny. Never thought you could get a girl out of her pants like that", Sakura joked as she started unbuttoning Tenten's shirt.

Ino snorted at the joke, and realized there was some truth as she felt her own skirt failing to keep a hold on her waist. Instead of standing up though, Hinata had easily removed it, her own diaper revealed as her pants were slipping on her every movement.

"This is weird", Ino said as she moved to help Hinata out of her pants. While doing so, she brushed against Hinata's diapered crotch, causing the heiress to moan.

"Did you like that?" Ino whispered seductively to Hinata as she moved to unzip her jacket. Hinata moaned and nodded. Ino finished unzipping and removed the jacket, revealing Hinata's bare chest.

"Wow, never thought you'd go without support, Hinata", Ino said, staring at Hinata's shrinking chest. What had once been her proud D's had been reduced to C's and were still shrinking.

"Didn't think I'd need it for a while" Hinata replied and moved to remove Ino's shirt.

It wasn't long before the girls had moved closer, Ino and Hinata with their hands in each others diapers while Sakura and Tenten were grinidng. Both were watching each other all the while as they still grew younger.

"Look at us", Sakura gasped as she looked on, "We're back in our chuunin years".

"Yeah", Tenten replied, "I can't believe how short your hair was, Hinata".

HInata groaned, "Or how long your hair was Sakura. You looked cute back then",

Sakura blushed, but not for Hinata's comment. She was embarrassed to admit the reason why she had kept it so long.

"Hinata, I'm so close!" Ino whimpered.

"Me too!" Hinata replied.

The next moment anyone knew, all of the girls were crying out as they came, shivering from the reactions and then falling to the floor, panting.

Ino looked up as she recovered, "So...what now? I doubt we'll have this much fun when we're kids again."

Sakura nodded, "I know. But we have a room just for this kind of thing".

And she led the still recovering girls into the nursery where several toys waited for them. Within a matter of minutes, Ino was on all fours, trying to process that her mind saw her as a baby while the other three toddled about, making cute sounds and playing with dolls.

This is so weird she thought, Never thought that they'd regress so quickly

Tenten noticed Ino on her fours and moved over to her. She surprised Ino when she spoke, "It's more fun if you just let go".

Ino fell onto her diapered butt and pointed at Tenten, "You...can still talk?"

Tenten nodded, "Yeah, for some reason whatever's got a hold on Sakura and Hinata is a bit different than me. I just join in cause it would make them feel better".

Tenten then crawled back, "C'mon! I've got a tea party with bear san and Holly chan if you want to join me".

Ino smiled and crawled after her. It was strange, since she did have her own fun watching her friends return to innocence once more. Yet if anyone outside the jutsu looked in, they would have seen four naked teenagers wearing diapers and acting like children.

info.description:
For those whom want the older characters in their story, this is the continuing adventure of Naruto and his friends as Naruto comes to grip with the powers of the Hypnosis Jutsu, originally created by OJAVIX.

The story can integrate throughout the story of Shippuden (meaning taking place at any time) but let's follow the rules shall we?:

This Jutsu works like this:
1.Hand signals in front of someone and they enter in hypnosis mode.
2.Once in hypnosis mode they will follow any command you say.
3.Once you say your commands you can wake them to start the fun or start the fun in hypnosis mode.

-Everything is acceptable, (even gay stuff, but preferably not) lesbianic stuff OK.
-I'm seeing if making all stories 10 chapters long will be a good idea. With a happy ending or bad ending depending on your choices along the story. If this works, you can even kill characters but preferably at the end of a story.
-If you decide to continue a story from the original, please follow it as it had been set up. To find the info, here is the link:
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1951333-Narutos-Hypnosis-Jutsu-Reb...

While stories can continue from the original story, new stories can be created, so for the most part, have fun with it.

Naruto and all related characters copyright their original works.
